overview:
Gary is the President and CEO of Hy9 Corporation, the leading hydrogen generation and purification company. As a startup veteran, Gary has been directly involved in the creation of four entirely new business categories that span e.readers, SaaS, enterprise software and clean energy. He has worked with such leaders as; Netscape Communications, USinternetworking, Vignette Corporation, Wolfram|Alpha and Amazon Kindle

Gary is an experienced consultant and speaker on emerging technologies and strategies. Gary has a PMD from Harvard Business School and a BS in Sociology from the College of Charleston. He served honorably in the US Army Special Operations Command and is an instrument rated, multi-engine commercial pilot
